Reviews.Title: Apple Iphone 4S 16GB
Reviews.Author: enfrcr55
Reviews.Content: This product was as advertised and works great. The great thing about the Iphone is you can save all your stuff and it downloads right to your new phone. I would definitely recommend this seller and the phone arrived in great condition.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4S that was an iPhone 4!
Reviews.Author: Kpainter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item thinking I was going to get an iPhone 4S. When I opened the box, it was an iPhone 4. Very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Exactly the same!
Reviews.Author: George Prine
Reviews.Content: My original iPhone was stolen in Paris by a band of youths.  This is a replacement phone and meets all expectations of my original iPhone.  Was able to, through the use of iCloud, retrieve all my memorable pictures.  It is a champ!  The transaction was fast and flawless!

Reviews.Title: great cell phone
Reviews.Author: claud
Reviews.Content: Got a great phone from a very good Amazon associate seller at a decent price. Its a refurbished one from Apple. I am also using an Apple Air refurb to post this review. If Apple has what you want in a refurbed product, you should buy it. It has been tested twice and cleaned up. Saving money is good too.I bought Iphone for my son whose Android one ceased to work. iPhone is much faster in 3G than old phone.
